group_1.textLeft: ...I'm sorry for making so many mistakes.
I really don't mean to frustrate you, Yozuru...

group_1.textRight: No, it’s...
The instructor has been very helpful to us.
As long as we correctly follow the recipe from @here on out, we should be fine.

group_1.textLeft: I...don’t think I can even manage that...

group_1.textRight: Miss Leila, you seem like you're very experienced @with baking.
Evidently, however, things haven’t been going @as well as they’re supposed to. Why is that?

group_1.textLeft: Well...
I love baking and making desserts. @I've even taken some professional lessons.
I used to make tons of desserts all the time.
But lately, I’ve been wondering if I’ve been doing @it the right way.
I’ve been stressing about it every single @time I bake...

group_1.textRight: So, in other words...
Your feelings have been getting in the way?

group_1.textLeft: ...I guess. Maybe it has to do with how I'm not @very confident anymore?

group_1.textRight: Then...
We'll just have to resort to using magic.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: As a Coordinator, I can make some alterations @to your mind.

group_1.narration: Sometimes, when a Coordinator adjusts a Soul Gem, @they make contact with their client’s memories.
When they do, they can make it easier to @forget bad memories and remember good ones.
In doing so, Yozuru could help @me get my confidence back.

group_1.textLeft: Can you really do that?

group_1.textRight: Yes. It works very well.
The mistakes you've made so far have been very simple.
Such as misreading the recipe or being clumsy.
This stems from your lack of confidence, @which causes a self-fulfilling cycle.
If we can fix that, then these missteps won't @happen anymore.
You'll be able to concentrate on the task at hand, @and show your true potential.

group_1.textLeft: Using magic like that...I don't know. @It feels like cheating in a way.
And asking for a free Coordination doesn't feel...

group_1.textRight: Then...
Why don't we say it's a temporary Coordination @until we finish the cake?
No payment will be necessary.
After all, as your partner, this will be to my @benefit as well.

group_1.textLeft: ...Are you sure?

group_1.textRight: Please, it's my offer to you.
Okay, then...relax, breathe out slowly...@Now take a deep breath.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301350:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock](Ah...!)

group_1.textRight: Your Coordination is complete. @How do you feel?

group_1.textLeft: I feel a little...refreshed.

group_1.textRight: How is your memory?
You should be recalling solely positive experiences @and emotions about baking.

group_1.textLeft: (She's right!)
(I only remember when Manaka praised me...!)
I think it worked! @The adjustment went perfectly!
Thank you, Yozuru!

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle* @It's my pleasure.
